required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of CSPCHA115 Capsules in Chinese Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Ascending Multiple-dose Clinical Trial of CSPCHA115 Capsules to Evaluate the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics in Chinese Healthy Volunteers

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: A randomized, single-center, double-blind, ascending multiple-dose, placebo-controlled study to evaluate the tolerability and pharmacokinetics of CSPCHA115 capsules in Chinese healthy volunteers.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number and incidence of subjects with Adverse Events (AEs)
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability after repeated administrations of CSPCHA115 capsules 100, 200, 400 and 600 mg

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with clinically significant symptoms abnormalities
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability after repeated administrations of CSPCHA115 capsules 100, 200, 400 and 600 mg

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with clinically significant vital sign abnormalities
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability after repeated administrations of CSPCHA115 capsules 100, 200, 400 and 600 mg

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with clinically significant physical examination abnormalities
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability after repeated administrations of CSPCHA115 capsules 100, 200, 400 and 600 mg

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with clinically significant laboratory abnormalities
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability after repeated administrations of CSPCHA115 capsules 100, 200, 400 and 600 mg

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with clinically significant electrocardiograms (ECGs) abnormalities
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability after repeated administrations of CSPCHA115 capsules 100, 200, 400 and 600 mg

primary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum observed concentration (Tmax)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1(Pre-dose and 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours); Day 5(Pre-dose); Day 6(Pre-dose); Day 7(Pre-dose and 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72 hours) after drug administration
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the pharmacokinetics after repeated administrations of CSPCHA115 capsules 100, 200, 400 and 600 mg

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1(Pre-dose and 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours); Day 5(Pre-dose); Day 6(Pre-dose); Day 7(Pre-dose and 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72 hours) after drug administration
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the pharmacokinetics after repeated administrations of CSPCHA115 capsules 100, 200, 400 and 600 mg

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to 24h (AUC0-24h)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1(Pre-dose and 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours); Day 5(Pre-dose); Day 6(Pre-dose); Day 7(Pre-dose and 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72 hours) after drug administration

arm_group.description: CSPCHA115 100 mg or placebo administered orally in the fasted state for 7 days. Eight subjects will receive CSPCHA115 Two subjects will receive matching placebo
CSPCHA115 200 mg or placebo administered orally in the fasted state for 7 days. Eight subjects will receive CSPCHA115 Two subjects will receive matching placebo
CSPCHA115 400 mg or placebo administered orally in the fasted state for 7 days. Eight subjects will receive CSPCHA115 Two subjects will receive matching placebo
CSPCHA115 600 mg or placebo administered orally in the fasted state for 7 days. Eight subjects will receive CSPCHA115 Two subjects will receive matching placebo

intervention.description: CSPCHA115 100 mg once daily in the fasted state for 7 days; Matching placebo 100 mg once daily in the fasted state for 7 days.
CSPCHA115 200 mg once daily in the fasted state for 7 days; Matching placebo 200 mg once daily in the fasted state for 7 days.
CSPCHA115 400 mg once daily in the fasted state for 7 days; Matching placebo 400 mg once daily in the fasted state for 7 days.
CSPCHA115 600 mg once daily in the fasted state for 7 days; Matching placebo 600 mg once daily in the fasted state for 7 days.

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Medicine, CSPC Clinical Development Division
